Review Gitlab Code with Optimi AI - AI-Powered Code Review Tool

Supercharge your code reviews with Optimi AI! This Chrome extension helps you streamline the code review process by leveraging advanced AI to automatically analyze, provide feedback, and suggest improvements for your code. Whether you’re a developer or a team leader, Optimi AI enhances your workflow by speeding up reviews, catching bugs, and ensuring clean, maintainable code.

Key Features:

	•	AI-Powered Code Analysis: Get instant insights, error detection, and performance suggestions with AI-driven analysis.
	•	Code Quality Enhancements: Suggestions for code refactoring, style improvements, and optimization tailored to your project’s best practices.
	•	Supports Multiple Languages: Works with popular programming languages like JavaScript, Python, Java, and more.
	•	Seamless Integration: Easily integrates into your existing review process on platforms like GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket.

Optimi AI is your new coding assistant that ensures every line of code is thoroughly reviewed and improved—saving you time while increasing the quality of your codebase.

Try it today and code smarter with AI!​⬤
